Some people would mistakenly call the times we live in grim or dark but clearly, today is a time of prosperity like no other. Nothing shows this fact off like the latest model of the MEAT Computer.
The MEAT Model X can achieve a calculation speed of 10 PFLOPS at very little energy cost. Traditional computers would take the amount of energy required to power a Capital LightRacer starship for an hour if they were to try and match what a MEAT Model X can do in a day. Evolution has built a better computer than engineers ever could.
